TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義服務用來識別本身的憑證。

span.span: Defines a certificate used by a service to identify itself.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用這個方法來設定服務認證的憑證。The following code shows how to use this method to set a certificate for a service credential. summary.span: 取得或設定在通訊回到用戶端時用來表示服務的憑證。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate to use for representing the service when communicating back to the client.

value.span: ，要在通訊回到用戶端時用來表示服務。

span.span: The to use for representing the service when communicating back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會用來取得或設定用於表示服務的憑證。This property is used to get or set the certificate used to represent the service. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用這個方法來取得在服務認證中所使用的憑證。The following code shows how to use this method to get the certificate used in a service's credentials. exception.span: 已嘗試在認證處於唯讀狀態時設定。

span.span: Attempted to set when credential is read-only.

summary.span: 指定要用來表示服務的憑證。

span.span: Specifies the certificate to use for representing the service.

param.name: storeLocation
param.span: 服務用來取得服務憑證之憑證存放區的位置。

span.span: The location of the certificate store the service uses to obtain the service certificate.

param.name: storeName
param.span: 指定要開啟之 X.509 憑證存放區的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.

summary.span: 藉由指定主體辨別名稱、憑證存放區名稱和存放區位置，指定要用來表示服務的憑證。

span.span: Specifies the certificate to use for representing the service by specifying the subject distinguished name, the certificate store name and store location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需 `subjectName` 參數的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information on the `subjectName` parameter, see . `storeLocation` 的值包含在 列舉型別中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：指派給本機電腦的憑證存放區 (預設值)。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default). - ：目前使用者所使用的憑證存放區。: the certificate store used by the current user. 如果用戶端應用程式是在系統帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 。If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果用戶端應用程式是在使用者帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 。If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 列舉型別中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用這個方法來設定服務認證的憑證。The following code shows how to use this method to set a certificate for a service credential. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/cs/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/vb/source.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCertificate (System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetCertificate(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType findType, object findValue) cil managed

public: void SetCertificate(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation storeLocation, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreName storeName, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509FindType findType, System::Object ^ findValue);

param.name: storeLocation
param.span: 用戶端用來取得用戶端憑證之憑證存放區的位置。

span.span: The location of the certificate store the client uses to obtain the client certificate.

param.name: storeName
param.span: 指定要開啟之 X.509 憑證存放區的名稱。

span.span: Specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.

param.name: findType
param.span: 定義要執行之 X.509 搜尋的類型。

span.span: Defines the type of X.509 search to be executed.

param.name: findValue
param.span: 要在 X.509 憑證存放區內搜尋的值。

span.span: The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.

summary.span: 藉由指定查詢參數 (例如，、、 和 )，指定要用來表示服務的憑證。

span.span: Specifies the certificate to use for representing the service by specifying query parameters such as , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `storeLocation` 的值包含在 列舉型別中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：指派給本機電腦的憑證存放區 (預設值)。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default). - ：目前使用者所使用的憑證存放區。: the certificate store used by the current user. 如果用戶端應用程式是在系統帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 。If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果用戶端應用程式是在使用者帳戶下執行，則憑證通常位於 。If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 列舉型別中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. `findType` 的值包含在 列舉型別中。Values for `findType` are included in the enumeration. 最常用的列舉型別 (Enumeration) 是 ，它會針對指定之存放區內憑證的主體名稱進行不區分大小寫的搜尋。The most commonly used enumeration is , which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store. 這可以是不精確的搜尋。This can be an imprecise search. 如果傳回一個以上的憑證，則會使用第一個符合搜尋的憑證來表示用戶端。If more than one certificate is returned then the first one matching the find is used to represent the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用這個方法來設定服務認證的憑證。The following code shows how to use this method to set a certificate for a service credential. [!code-csharp[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UEX509CertificateRecipientServiceCredential#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uex509certificaterecipientservicecredential/vb/source.vb#2)]
